item.title: Senior Product Manager (palo alto)
item.description:
Mobile Stealth Company is actively recruiting for a senior level Product Manager for a full-time position to support it's mobile portal initiatives.

This role works directly with the VP of Product Development & Engineering

The Senior Director of Product Management will:
· Define key features for the mobile portal services initiatives with our customer projects, as well as write project plans detailing these projects.
· Evaluate mobile content, advertising and affiliate partners sites to determine which are best suited to be partners for technical, business, and editorial reasons.
· Evaluate the markup and web-based API's of content sites, determine how to integrate them with our platform and write specifications describing the integration.
· Bring these projects live, working closely with developers, project managers, designers, customers, quality assurance, and the our management team.
· Act as the focal point of contact for teams/customers globally
· Partner with product managers working on other projects to leverage work across the organization.
· Analyze and measure the effectiveness and competitiveness of our implementations


Job Requirements
· At least 8 years of experience in Product Management, user interface design/implementation, or Web Production at a consumer Internet or software company.
· Strong understanding of Internet technologies, especially HTML, and the operations of Web sites.
· Excellent product and user interface sense, demonstrated consistently over time.
· Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Foreign language ability a major plus.
· Strong cross-functional team building and communication skills.
· Proven track record of shipping successful products.
· Bachelor's degree or equivalent.

To apply, send your resume with Sr. Director of Product Management in the subject.
